tags.name: tinto-typography
tags.description: Responsive typography component with variants, font presets, highlight, and optional link wrapping.

attributes.name: variant
attributes.description: Visual text style variant (controls default font-size/weight via CSS class).

attributes.name: as
attributes.description: Semantic HTML tag to render (overrides default from variant).

attributes.name: font-size
attributes.description: Font size token (overrides variant preset when set).

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Text color (CSS color value, default inherit).

attributes.name: weight
attributes.description: Font weight (e.g. 400, 500, 700, bold). Accepts numeric or string CSS font-weight.

attributes.name: inline
attributes.description: Render as inline element instead of block.

attributes.name: highlight
attributes.description: Background highlight color behind the text (CSS color value).

attributes.name: visible
attributes.description: Controls visibility. When false, text is hidden but layout remains.

attributes.name: href
attributes.description: If set, wraps content in an <a> tag with this URL.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: Link target when href is set.

attributes.name: rel
attributes.description: Link rel attribute. When target="_blank", noopener noreferrer are automatically added.
